title: Armazem Raiz
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Fusion
description: Food shop and veggie cafe and cooking workshops. Has seating where one could have a coconut milkshake with tropical fruit, a lassi with cashew yogurt, a sandwich or a raw wrap. Focus is on raw food. NOTE - map marker is not accurate, please send HappyCow the correct coordinates.
streetAddress: Av. Bahia dos Golfinhos 748, Vila Mangueira, Porto de Tibau do Sol
